skip.description: Allows user to skip the response area

autoSubmit.description: Go straight to next page once this page is complete

autoBegin.description: Go straight into exam, without having to press the 'Begin' button

examInstructions.description: Replaces the top-level instruction text on the CHA exam pages (each page after starting page)

measureBackground.description: Select a method from the list below to measure background noise after an audiometry exam

NoiseLevel.description: Absolute level at which noise is played, in dBA SPL

InitialStepSize.description: Change in SNR for first 4 presenations, in dB

StepSize.description: Change in SNR after each response, in dB

InitialSNR.description: SNR for the first presentation, in dB

ListNumber.description: One-based index of the list to use. The value 0 represents the default behavior, which is to select the list randomly.

DisableRepeatFirstUntilCorrect.description: By default, this exam will repeat the first presentation until the subject gets it correct. If this field is set to true, the exam will not repeat the first presentation until the subject gets it correct.
